name: Strong & Stable Leader
description:
Strong & Stable Leader is a game made to make you think about British politics whilst having a laugh. Play the newly elected leader of the Tory party and try to stay in-power whilst making the choices YOU really want to make. Trying to keep party support whilst pushing left wing policies can be hard but it can be done!

Game Features: 

  • Over 35 political questions to get you thinking about current affairs.
  • Upgradable office that is upgraded by spending the tax-payers money.
  • A city skyline that changes depending on your choices.
  • 10 unlockable achievements that save and are visually represented in game. 
  • Full joypad support, with visual button maps for PS4 DS4 controllers and Xbox controllers.

The game was made in 2 days for the 'Games For The Many' Manchester Political Game Jam 2018 by: 

  • Unity Development & Programming - Ste Wilson (from Bare Knuckle Development)
  • Graphics & Artwork - Rooney (from Bloodline Games) & Nacho O'Mullony
  • Music & Sound Design - David Littlefair
  • Writing & Research - Tony Leavy (from Bare Knuckle Development)
  • Menu Music - Electric Fan Death
